Title: Establishes commercial rent regulation
Summary: Relates to establishing commercial rent regulation; establishes a right to renew leases and authorizes the rent guidelines board to establish maximum rents.
LawCode: Add Title 22 Chap 14 §§22-1401 - 22-1408, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing commercial rent regulation
